sections.heading: Set Up a Family Map
sections.instructorNotes: Demonstrate MOTHER (left), FATHER (right) and explain that reusing space prevents confusion later.

sections.heading: Introduce Relatives
sections.instructorNotes: Guide students to sign FAMILY, then fingerspell names. Correct gently if indexing points shift.

sections.heading: Siblings & Children
sections.instructorNotes: Drill HOW-MANY. Require number-first responses. If a student struggles, model and have them mirror.

sections.heading: Partner Drill
sections.instructorNotes: Walk the room. Encourage Student B to repeat back one detailâ€”reinforces active listening.
